form.label: HOWTO DISK: Generate stats and charts with Splunk Search Processing Language (SPL)
form.description: This collection of request samples will help you generating your own reports, dashboards and alerts for Nmon Performance data using the native Search Processing Language

panel.title: Optionally preset frameID,hostname,device and press Enter:
Time oriented and statistics oriented charts:

div.h2: DISKXFER: Average Number of IOPS (Number of Input / Output operations per second on disks) aggregated per server over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | stats sum(value) AS value by _time,frameID,hostname | timechart `nmon_span` useother=f limit=0 avg(value) AS "I/O sec" by hostname

a.href: search?q=search %20eventtype%3Dnmon%3Aperformance%20type%3DDISKXFER frameID%3D$frameID$ hostname%3D$hostname$ device%3D$device$%0A| dedup _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2Cvalue%0A| stats sum(value) AS value by _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%0A| timechart `nmon_span` useother%3Df limit%3D0 avg(value) AS "I%2FO sec" by hostname&display.page.search.tab=visualizations&display.general.type=visualizations&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.minimumNumber=0&display.visualizations.charting.chart=line&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.maximumNumber=&display.visualizations.charting.legend.placement=top&earliest=-24h%40h&latest=now&display.visualizations.charting.axisTitleY.text=I%2FO per sec

div.h2: DISKXFER: Average Number of IOPS (Number of Input / Output operations per second on disks) in mutli-series mode per server/device over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval key=hostname+":"+device | timechart `nmon_span` limit=0 useother=f avg(value) AS value by key

div.h2: DISKBUSY: Percentage of time Busy Disk aggregated per server over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBUSY frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | stats avg(value) AS value by _time,frameID,hostname | timechart `nmon_span` useother=f limit=0 avg(value) AS "% Busy" by hostname

a.href: search?q=search %20eventtype%3Dnmon%3Aperformance%20type%3DDISKBUSY frameID%3D$frameID$ hostname%3D$hostname$ device%3D$device$%0A| dedup _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2Cvalue%0A| stats avg(value) AS value by _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%0A| timechart `nmon_span` useother%3Df limit%3D0 avg(value) AS "%25 Busy" by hostname&display.page.search.tab=visualizations&display.general.type=visualizations&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.minimumNumber=0&display.visualizations.charting.chart=line&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.maximumNumber=&display.visualizations.charting.legend.placement=top&earliest=-24h%40h&latest=now&display.visualizations.charting.axisTitleY.text=%25 Busy

div.h2: DISKBUSY: Percentage of time Busy Disk aggregated in mutli-series mode per server/device over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBUSY frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval key=hostname+":"+device | timechart `nmon_span` limit=0 useother=f avg(value) As value by key

div.h2: DISKREAD/DISKWRITE: Disk Read and Write data rate (Kbytes/sec) aggregated in a dual series per server over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKREAD OR type=DISKWRITE frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,type,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval read_value=case(type == "DISKREAD", value) | eval write_value=case(type == "DISKWRITE", value) | bucket _time span=1m | stats avg(read_value) AS read_value, avg(write_value) AS write_value by _time,frameID,hostname | timechart `nmon_span` avg(read_value) AS "read_data_rate", avg(write_value) AS "write_data_rate" by hostname

a.href: search?q=search %20eventtype%3Dnmon%3Aperformance%20type%3DDISKREAD OR type%3DDISKWRITE frameID%3D$frameID$ hostname%3D$hostname$ device%3D$device$%0A| dedup _time%2Ctype%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2Cvalue%0A| eval read_value%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKREAD"%2C value)%0A| eval write_value%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKWRITE"%2C value)%0A| bucket _time span%3D1m%0A| stats avg(read_value) AS read_value%2C avg(write_value) AS write_value by _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%0A| timechart `nmon_span` avg(read_value) AS "read_data_rate"%2C avg(write_value) AS "write_data_rate" by hostname&display.page.search.tab=visualizations&display.general.type=visualizations&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.minimumNumber=0&display.visualizations.charting.chart=line&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.maximumNumber=&display.visualizations.charting.legend.placement=top&earliest=-24h%40h&latest=now&display.visualizations.charting.axisTitleY.text=Kbytes%2Fsec

div.h2: DISKBSIZE: Disk Average data transfer size (KBytes per transfer) aggregated per server over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBSIZE frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | bucket _time span=1m | stats avg(value) AS value by _time,frameID,hostname | timechart `nmon_span` avg(value) AS "data_transfer" by hostname

a.href: search?q=search %20eventtype%3Dnmon%3Aperformance%20type%3DDISKBSIZE frameID%3D$frameID$ hostname%3D$hostname$ device%3D$device$%0A| dedup _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2Cvalue%0A| bucket _time span%3D1m%0A| stats avg(value) AS value by _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%0A| timechart `nmon_span` avg(value) AS "data_transfer" by hostname&display.page.search.tab=visualizations&display.general.type=visualizations&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.minimumNumber=0&display.visualizations.charting.chart=line&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.maximumNumber=&display.visualizations.charting.legend.placement=top&earliest=-24h%40h&latest=now&display.visualizations.charting.axisTitleY.text=KBytes per transfer

div.h2: DISKBSIZE: Disk Average data transfer size (KBytes per transfer) per server/device in a multi-series chart over last 24 hours (with protection against data duplicates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKBSIZE frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval key=hostname+":"+device | timechart `nmon_span` limit=0 useother=f avg(value) As value by key

div.h2: Single form of 5 minute real time window for Average main Disks Statistics (Average main Disks Statistics for Busy Time, Data Transfer, IOPS, Read and Write Data Rates)
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER OR type=DISKBUSY OR type=DISKREAD OR type=DISKWRITE OR type=DISKBSIZE frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,type,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval sum_disk_total_IOPS=case(type == "DISKXFER", value) | eval avg_disk_busy_PCT=case(type == "DISKBUSY", value) | eval avg_disk_read_rate_KBps=case(type == "DISKREAD", value) | eval avg_disk_write_rate_KBps=case(type == "DISKWRITE", value) | eval avg_disk_data_transfer_KB=case(type == "DISKBSIZE", value) | fields _time,frameID,hostname,device,*disk* | stats sum(sum_*) AS *, avg(avg_*) AS * by _time,frameID,hostname | stats avg(*) AS "*" | foreach * [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | eval disk_total_IOPS=round(disk_total_IOPS, 0) | eval stats=disk_busy_PCT + "% Busy time / " + disk_data_transfer_KB + " KB Data Transfer / " + disk_total_IOPS + " Total iops / " + disk_read_rate_KBps + " KBps, " + disk_write_rate_KBps + " KBps - Read, Write Data Rates" | fields stats

a.href: search?q=search %20eventtype%3Dnmon%3Aperformance%20type%3DDISKXFER OR type%3DDISKBUSY OR type%3DDISKREAD OR type%3DDISKWRITE OR type%3DDISKBSIZE frameID%3D$frameID$ hostname%3D$hostname$ device%3D$device$%0A| dedup _time%2Ctype%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2Cvalue%0A| eval sum_disk_total_IOPS%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKXFER"%2C value)%0A| eval avg_disk_busy_PCT%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKBUSY"%2C value)%0A| eval avg_disk_read_rate_KBps%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKREAD"%2C value)%0A| eval avg_disk_write_rate_KBps%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKWRITE"%2C value)%0A| eval avg_disk_data_transfer_KB%3Dcase(type %3D%3D "DISKBSIZE"%2C value)%0A| fields _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%2Cdevice%2C*disk*%0A| stats sum(sum_*) AS *%2C avg(avg_*) AS * by _time%2CframeID%2Chostname%0A| stats avg(*) AS "*" | foreach * [ eval <<FIELD>>%3Dround('<<FIELD>>'%2C 2) ] | eval disk_total_IOPS%3Dround(disk_total_IOPS%2C 0)%0A| eval stats%3Ddisk_busy_PCT %2B "%25 Busy time %2F " %2B disk_data_transfer_KB %2B " KB Data Transfer %2F " %2B disk_total_IOPS %2B " Total iops %2F " %2B disk_read_rate_KBps %2B " KBps%2C " %2B disk_write_rate_KBps %2B " KBps - Read%2C Write Data Rates"%0A| fields stats&display.page.search.tab=visualizations&display.general.type=visualizations&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.minimumNumber=0&display.visualizations.charting.chart=line&display.visualizations.charting.axisY.maximumNumber=&display.visualizations.charting.legend.placement=top&earliest=rt-5m&latest=rt&display.visualizations.charting.axisTitleY.text=Kbytes%2Fsec&display.visualizations.type=singlevalue&display.visualizations.singlevalue.underLabel=Average main Disks Statistics for Busy Time%2C Data Transfer%2C IOPS%2C Read and Write Data Rates

div.h2: Report Average Disk Busy time (DISKBUSY, %), Data Transfer size (DISKBSIZE, KB), total IOPS (DISKXFER), Read and Write data rates (DISKREAD/DISKWRITE, KBps) in a formated table statistics over last 24 hours per frameID, hostname
div.pre: eventtype=nmon:performance type=DISKXFER OR type=DISKBUSY OR type=DISKREAD OR type=DISKWRITE OR type=DISKBSIZE frameID=$frameID$ hostname=$hostname$ device=$device$ | dedup _time,type,frameID,hostname,device,value | eval sum_disk_total_IOPS=case(type == "DISKXFER", value) | eval avg_disk_busy_PCT=case(type == "DISKBUSY", value) | eval avg_disk_read_rate_KBps=case(type == "DISKREAD", value) | eval avg_disk_write_rate_KBps=case(type == "DISKWRITE", value) | eval avg_disk_data_transfer_KB=case(type == "DISKBSIZE", value) | fields _time,frameID,hostname,device,*disk* | stats sum(sum_*) AS *, avg(avg_*) AS * by _time,frameID,hostname | stats avg(*) AS "Avg *" by frameID,hostname | foreach Avg* [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | foreach Avg* [ eval <<FIELD>>=round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | sort frameID,hostname | rename *_PCT AS "* (%)", *_KB AS "* (KB)", *_KBps AS "* (KBps)", *_IOPS AS "* (I/O per sec)" | fieldformat "Avg disk_busy (%)"='Avg disk_busy (%)'." %" | fieldformat "Avg disk_data_transfer (KB)"='Avg disk_data_transfer (KB)'." KB" | fieldformat "Avg disk_read_rate (KBps)"='Avg disk_read_rate (KBps)'." KBps" | fieldformat "Avg disk_write_rate (KBps)"='Avg disk_write_rate (KBps)'."
